rev.comment: unnecessary fair use, and no rationale for use anyway

Line 34: Line 34:
The concluding interview features US Vietnam veteran Randy Floyd, stating "We've all tried very hard to escape what we have learned in Vietnam. I think Americans have worked extremely hard not to see the criminality that their officials and their policy makers exhibited."<ref>{{citeweb |author=Monaco, James. |url=http://direct.bl.uk/bld/PlaceOrder.do?UIN=133218452&ETOC=RN&from=searchengine |title=Hearts & Minds |publisher=''[[Cineaste (magazine)]]'' |date=Summer, 2003. |accessdate=November 15, 2008}}</ref>
The concluding interview features US Vietnam veteran Randy Floyd, stating "We've all tried very hard to escape what we have learned in Vietnam.
